title: Santa Monica
name: Santa Monica Beach
content: A large, wide, beautiful beach on either side of the pier.  Perry's rents bikes and roller blades or bring your own for use on the world famous *strand* that links all of the Westside beach cities.  For some of the best people watching in the world, follow the strand south a couple of miles to [[Venice (California)|Venice Beach]].  Hire a bike or skates and travel along the cycle path (there are a number of shops to hire from around and on the pier).
